title: Is Riot not doing any more Riot skin related sales during Pax events?
body: Usually there is a new Riot skin that comes out during these times, or at least some form of availability in the league store to purchase a previous Riot skin.

replies.body: We actually didn't do a Riot skin for 2015 events, either. It's not that we're against them, we just decided not to this time around. Rather than the Riot skins, for events, we've handed out Arcade Hecarim, Dragonslayer Pantheon among others. Just a change of pace. :)

@riot katey haii again... meh  has there been any talk about rito putting any of those skins into the hextech system maby? or like even tie them to rare gems like hextech annie is... so like maby pax tf... pax sivir ext would cost like 30+ rare gems.... because Not everyone can go to pax *cris*  tho someday id love to go see what one is like ;3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

You can get a lot of the Riot skins via Hextech Crafting - I personally snagged Riot Kayle. I believe Singed is the only one not available. As for PAX skins, we don't have plans to include them. 

Side note - PAX is really fun, but really exhausting. ;_;
oooo nice  and i bet ive never been to a huge thing like that let alone to smaller events

I know you can't comment on this or make any promises one way or another but I think it would be fantastic if there was an opportunity to buy some of the Riot skins in season 6 or at least bring it up for consideration at some point to the parties involved in those decisions.

Actually, Riot didn't attend any events, officially, in 2015.  If you met a Rioter at a convention last year, you could get a Fist Bump ward code on a small card.

Kinda surprised that there weren't any codes at all for PAX East.  Must not be in the events budget, anymore...
